EmailTemplate.description: Email to Case - Email of acknowledgement for demographic change request
EmailTemplate.name: Email To Case BCBSIL Acknowledgement
EmailTemplate.subject: BCBS of Illinois Demographic Change Request Form Received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Submitter,
Thank you for contacting Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Illinois. This email is confirmation we have received your request, case number {!Case.CaseNumber}, Your request may take up to 30 days to complete. Once completed, a notification will be sent to the email address submitted with the Demographic Change Request Form.
To check the status of your case, please click on status checker({!$Setup.UtilitySettings_Hierarchy__c.CaseStatusUrl__c}) or for any questions, contact "Netops_Provider_Update@bcbsil.com".
Sincerely,
Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Illinois
